modShortDescription: If you agree that the chainsaw in this game is sorely underpowered, check out the Happy Little Chainsaw. NerdyHippie has buffed the damage by about 12x.
modDescription:
If you agree that the [chainsaw](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-tools/) in this game is sorely underpowered, check out the Happy Little Chainsaw. NerdyHippie has buffed the damage by about 12x and greatly increased the chance of dismemberment.

**[Download](https://docs.google.com/uc?export=download&id=1_hEhpn_2N5ak77Z-lMjeqOs-8v5Ve8Lc)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/23416-nerdys-happy-little-chainsaw-mod/).

**Credits:** [NerdyHippie](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/nerdyhippie/)
